_instructions: Add keywords that indicate INCOME (money coming IN) to your bank account. These help correctly separate deposits from expenses when your bank statement has both Debits and Credits columns.
_examples: If your paycheck shows as 'XYZ Corp Payroll' but appears in expenses, add 'PAYROLL' below
If direct deposits show as 'DD ACH' but appear in expenses, add 'DD' or 'DIRECT DEPOSIT' below
If tax refunds appear in expenses, add 'TAX REFUND' below
_note: Keywords are case-insensitive and will match if they appear ANYWHERE in the transaction description
